dlc: " Skittering Vermin   Art by: Allen Michael N. Geneta      Layout by: Anna Michelle  Meservier     Mythic Portal is proud to bring a stunning set of pernicious Vermin tokens for use in any fantasy setting or system. Included are 24 beautifully drawn creepy crawlies including bugs snakes bats reptiles crustaceans and more all with four different border variants.    No matter your unnerving vermin needs Mythic Portal Games has you covered. As always our tokens are fully compatible with any of our One Minute Maps series!      "
